price: ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߒߠߋ ߓߊ߬ ߸ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߒߠߋ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߘߌ߫ ، ߒ ߕߍ߫ ߝߋ߲߫ ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߛߌ߫ ߝߙߊ߬ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߊ߲߬
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
